content: At <style=NpcName>Civilla</style> the Magician's tent, you can try your luck and draw all sorts of fun handheld items.
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: If you're hoping to make some new friends, drop by <style=Highlight>Cafe Untamed</style> for a chat, or just pull up a seat outside and introduce yourself.
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Jellies are everyone's fave here at the Bazaar. You can even use them to <style=Highlight>redeem mysterious prizes</style>, but they're exclusive to the Bazaar!
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I've sent the app for connecting with friends to your Phone. Now it's time to explore the <style=Highlight>Galactic Bazaar</style> and have some fun!
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A拍拍衣服}And here's a little gift from the Bazaar! <style=SizeSmall>Let's see, let's see...</style> Here you go — <style=Highlight>Hat-Trick Magic Tickets</style> and some <style=Highlight>Bazaar Jellies</style>!{A拍拍衣服}
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A打招呼}Hey there, Starsea voyager. I'm <style=NpcName>Goodman</style>, your guide here at the Galactic Bazaar.
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II
星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: If you'd like to chat with someone, try adding them as a friend first. Then you'll be able to talk anytime!
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Welcome! Let me give you a quick tour of the Galactic Bazaar. The central plaza's where people gather and chat. You can also sign up for the <style=Highlight>Decadanza Dance-A-Thon</style> here with the host, <style=NpcName>Aleo</style>!
info: 星空街市的向导-古多曼-复杂对话_主流程文本II
